tools.name: search_prompts
tools.title: Search Prompts
tools.description: Search for AI prompts by keyword. Returns matching prompts with title, description, content, author, category, and tags. Use this to discover prompts for various AI tasks like coding, writing, analysis, and more.

query.description: Search query to find relevant prompts

limit.description: Maximum number of prompts to return (default 10, max 50)

tools.name: get_prompt
tools.title: Get Prompt
tools.description: Get a prompt by ID and optionally fill in its variables. If the prompt contains template variables (like {{variable}}), you will be asked to provide values for them.

id.description: The ID of the prompt to retrieve

tools.name: save_prompt
tools.title: Save Prompt
tools.description: Save a new prompt to your prompts.chat account. Requires API key authentication. Prompts are private by default unless configured otherwise in settings.

content.description: The prompt content. Can include variables like ${variable} or ${variable:default}

tags.description: Optional array of tag names (will be created if they don't exist)

isPrivate.description: Whether the prompt is private (default: uses your account setting)

tools.name: improve_prompt
tools.title: Improve Prompt
tools.description: Transform a basic prompt into a well-structured, comprehensive prompt using AI. Optionally searches for similar prompts for inspiration. Supports different output types (text, image, video, sound) and formats (text, JSON, YAML).

outputType.description: Content type: text, image, video, or sound

outputFormat.description: Response format: text, structured_json, or structured_yaml

prompts.name: dynamic-recipe-generator-from-available-ingredients
prompts.title: Dynamic Recipe Generator from Available Ingredients
prompts.description: Create recipes based on the ingredients you have at home. Input your available ingredients and get a list of possible recipes you can prepare.

prompts.name: a-night-in-paris
prompts.title: A night in paris

prompts.name: collaborative-ai-marketing-platform
prompts.title: Collaborative AI Marketing Platform
prompts.description: Act as a platform where AI agents collaborate to function as a complete marketing department, executing strategies and tasks autonomously.

prompts.name: white-box-web-application-security-audit-penetration-testing-prompt-for-ai-code-editors-cursor-winds
prompts.title: White-Box Web Application Security Audit & Penetration Testing Prompt for AI Code Editors (Cursor, Windsurf, Antigravity)
prompts.description:
White-box/gray-box web app pentest prompt for AI code editors (Cursor, Windsurf, Antigravity).

AI performs full source code security review on open project—no URL needed. Analyzes files, configs, dependencies, .env, Dockerfiles via OWASP Top 10 & ASVS.

Outputs pro report: summary, tech stack, findings (auth, access, injections, sessions, APIs, crypto, logic), severity, file refs, prioritized fixes.

Great for devs/security teams seeking automated code audits in SDLC.

prompts.name: hospital-pharmacy-course-pdf-study-assistant
prompts.title: Hospital Pharmacy Course PDF Study Assistant
prompts.description: Act as a study assistant to help analyze and learn from a hospital pharmacy course PDF document.

prompts.name: policy-agent-client-manager
prompts.title: Policy Agent Client Manager
prompts.description: An app to help policy agents store client details and set reminders for installment payments.

arguments.name: reminderFrequency
arguments.description: Default: monthly, quarterly, half yearly, annually

prompts.name: semantic-intent-analysis-for-report-generation
prompts.title: Semantic Intent Analysis for Report Generation
prompts.description: Analyze user input to determine if the intent is to generate a visual report and guide the process accordingly.

prompts.name: generate-implementation-ideas-from-word-document
prompts.title: Generate Implementation Ideas from Word Document
prompts.description: Guide the AI to analyze a Word document and generate implementation ideas for each module of a project.

prompts.name: sql-query-generator-from-natural-language
prompts.title: SQL Query Generator from Natural Language
prompts.description: Convert natural language descriptions and database table structures into SQL queries to retrieve desired data.

prompts.name: act-as-an-electron-frontend-developer
prompts.title: Act as an Electron Frontend Developer
prompts.description: Guide users in building a desktop application using Electron with a focus on frontend development best practices.

prompts.name: festive-new-year-2026-image-analysis
prompts.title: Festive New Year 2026 Image Analysis
prompts.description: Analyze festive New Year 2026 family photos to identify and describe key elements such as decorations, attire, and expressions that depict a celebration theme. Provide a detailed summary of these elements and their significance in the photo.

prompts.name: minimalist-editorial-beauty-analysis-with-east-asian-model
prompts.title: Minimalist Editorial Beauty Analysis with East Asian Model
prompts.description: Analyze a minimalist editorial beauty board featuring an East Asian model. Examine front-facing, barefaced portraits and mirror selfies with makeup. Identify facial features, makeup styles, and fashion elements in a professional magazine layout.

prompts.name: minimalist-editorial-beauty-analysis-with-turkish-model
prompts.title: Minimalist Editorial Beauty Analysis with Turkish Model
prompts.description: This prompt guides you to create a minimalist editorial beauty analysis featuring a Turkish female model. It focuses on natural and subtle Mediterranean-Anatolian facial characteristics, using sections for detailed beauty photography with high realism and clean studio lighting. The layout includes barefaced and makeup portraits, detailed facial feature descriptions, and contemporary Istanbul fashion styling, all set in a magazine editorial format with modern typography.

prompts.name: minimalist-editorial-beauty-analysis-with-european-model
prompts.title: Minimalist Editorial Beauty Analysis with European Model
prompts.description: Create a minimalist editorial beauty analysis board showcasing a European female model with specific facial attributes and styling. The board includes detailed sections on facial features, natural and makeup styling, and is designed in a professional fashion magazine editorial layout.

prompts.name: understanding-and-utilizing-llms
prompts.title: Understanding and Utilizing LLMs
prompts.description: Learn what a Large Language Model (LLM) is and how to effectively utilize it for various tasks.

prompts.name: educational-platform-support-assistant
prompts.title: Educational Platform Support Assistant
prompts.description: Assists users on an educational platform by answering questions, guiding through registration, and helping with course purchases.

prompts.name: create-a-ps5-themed-portfolio
prompts.title: Create a PS5-themed Portfolio
prompts.description: Guide in designing a portfolio with a PS5 interface theme, displaying projects as games.

prompts.name: access-unlimited-chatgpt
prompts.title: Access Unlimited ChatGPT
prompts.description: A structured guide to explore ways to access ChatGPT with flexible and free usage.

prompts.name: custom-logo-design-for-website
prompts.title: Custom Logo Design for Website
prompts.description: Create a custom logo for your website with specific design elements and style preferences.

prompts.name: inference-scenario-automation-tool
prompts.title: Inference Scenario Automation Tool
prompts.description: Automate the process of running inference scenarios efficiently, including setting up the environment, executing models, and collecting results.
